key_risks: Retail sector volatility due to e-commerce growth and changing consumer behavior
Tenant concentration risk with reliance on key tenants like Target
Economic sensitivity to downturns impacting consumer spending and vacancy rates
Regulatory and environmental risks in urban development projects
COVID-19 impact on tenant stability and rent deferrals
controversies: Potential delays and cost increases from regulatory hurdles in urban development
Impact of tenant bankruptcies and rent deferrals during the COVID-19 pandemic
environmental_issues: Environmental concerns related to development projects in urban areas
social_issues: Community engagement and corporate responsibility initiatives, including local job creation and minority contracting
governance_issues: ESG policy oversight by the Board of Trustees
